Header: Founder of FB Mark Zuckerberg to implement real life version of Jarvis
Content: Founder of Facebook, Mark Zuckerberg who is known for setting himself tough challenges has taken things to the next level with his personal project for 2016 which is aimed at bringing Jarvis, Iron Man’s trusty digital assistant to life. Zuckerberg who wanted to build his own AI (artificial intelligence) bot to help him run his life more efficiently — but he references Jarvis, probably the best example, to explain his lofty ambition. He stated that his personal challenge for 2016 was to build a simple AI to run his home and help him with his work. He added that he going to start by exploring the latest technology and thereafter start teaching it to understand his voice to control everything in his house – music, lights, temperature etc. He went on to note that he will teach it to let friends in my looking at their faces when the doorbell is rung and also on the work side it will help him visualize data in VR to help him build better services and lead his organizations more effectively.
